column4: hi... just wondering if anyone has a similar problem... when i scroll in firefox, the words get jumbled and i can't read anything. how do i fix this?

it happens in plenty of apps... even this one
what video driver?
nvidia
version?
try nv to check if it'S the driver
nv?
nv is the open source nvidia drievr. as opposed to the proprietary one you are using right now

no. but you still want to use it to do bug testing

still here?

but I dunno what could be it. driver or compiz are the most likely culprits I'd said

xserver-xgl, if you have that still installed, uninstall it
